named-query.name: clusteringSummary.getClusteringSummary
named-query.query: SELECT new org.apromore.dao.model.ClusteringSummary(count(c.clusterId), min(c.size), max(c.size), min(c.avgFragmentSize), max(c.avgFragmentSize), min(c.BCR), max(c.BCR)) FROM Cluster c

named-query.name: cluster.getClusterById
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Cluster c WHERE c.clusterId = :clusterId

named-query.name: fragmentDistance.getDistancesBelowThreshold
named-query.query: SELECT fd FROM FragmentDistance fd WHERE fd.distance < :threshold

named-query.name: fragmentDistance.getDistance
named-query.query: SELECT fd.distance FROM FragmentDistance fd WHERE fd.id.fragmentId1 = :fragmentId1 AND fd.id.fragmentId2 = :fragmentId2

named-query.name: clusterAssignment.getFragmentIdsOfCluster
named-query.query: SELECT ca.id.fragmentId FROM ClusterAssignment ca WHERE ca.id.clusterId = :clusterId

named-query.name: fragmentVersion.getFragmentsOfProcesses
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FragmentVersion f, ProcessFragmentMap m, ProcessModelVersion pmv, ProcessBranch b, Process p WHERE f.fragmentVersionId = m.fragmentVersion.fragmentVersionId AND m.processModelVersion.processModelVersionId = pmv.processModelVersionId AND pmv.processBranch.branchId = b.branchId AND b.process.processId = p.processId AND p.processId IN (:processIds)

named-query.name: clusterAssignment.getFragmentsOfCluster
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FragmentVersion f, ClusterAssignment ca WHERE ca.id.clusterId = :clusterId AND ca.id.fragmentId = f.fragmentVersionId

named-query.name: clusterAssignment.getFragmentsOfCluster2
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM FragmentVersion f, ClusterAssignment ca, ProcessFragmentMap m, ProcessModelVersion pmv WHERE ca.id.clusterId = :clusterId AND ca.id.fragmentId = f.fragmentVersionId AND f.fragmentVersionId = m.fragmentVersion.fragmentVersionId AND m.processModelVersion.processModelVersionId = pmv.processModelVersionId

named-query.name: cluster.getFilteredClusters
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Cluster c WHERE (c.size > :minClusterSize OR c.size = :minClusterSize) AND (c.size < :maxClusterSize OR c.size = :maxClusterSize) AND (c.avgFragmentSize > :minAvgFragmentSize OR c.avgFragmentSize = :minAvgFragmentSize) AND (c.avgFragmentSize < :maxAvgFragmentSize OR c.avgFragmentSize = :maxAvgFragmentSize) AND (c.BCR > :minBCR OR c.BCR = :minBCR) AND (c.BCR < :maxBCR OR c.BCR = :maxBCR)
